mapper.select: SELECT W.WISH_NUMBER,W.WISH_TITLE,W.WISH_TYPE, W.WISH_SIZE, W.WISH_SIZE_TEXT, W.WISH_MONEY, W.WISH_ADDR, A.APPLY_STATUS, A.USER_ID FROM APPLY_STATUS A LEFT JOIN WISH W ON W.WISH_NUMBER = A.WISH_NUMBER WHERE W.WISH_NUMBER = #{wish_number} AND A.USER_ID = #{user_id}

SELECT SELLER.WISH_NUMBER, SELLER.CATEGORY_PARENT, SELLER.CATEGORY_NUMBER, SELLER.MAJOR_TEXT, WCS.USER_ID, WCS.WISH_CATEGORY_SELLER_ANSWER, WCS.WISH_CATEGORY_SELLER_PRICE FROM WISH_CATEGORY_SELLER WCS RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT MC.WISH_NUMBER, MC.CATEGORY_NUMBER AS CATEGORY_PARENT, C.CATEGORY_NUMBER, MC.MAJOR_TEXT FROM MAJOR_CATEGORY_CONTENT MC LEFT JOIN ( SELECT C.CATEGORY_NUMBER, C.CATEGORY_PARENT, S.WISH_NUMBER FROM CATEGORY C RIGHT JOIN SUB_CATEGORY S ON C.CATEGORY_NUMBER = S.CATEGORY_NUMBER WHERE C.CATEGORY_PARENT IS NOT NULL) C ON MC.CATEGORY_NUMBER = C.CATEGORY_PARENT AND C.WISH_NUMBER = MC.WISH_NUMBER WHERE MC.WISH_NUMBER = #{wish_number} UNION SELECT C.WISH_NUMBER, C.CATEGORY_PARENT, C.CATEGORY_NUMBER, MC.MAJOR_TEXT FROM MAJOR_CATEGORY_CONTENT MC RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT S.WISH_NUMBER, C.CATEGORY_PARENT, C.CATEGORY_NUMBER FROM CATEGORY C RIGHT JOIN SUB_CATEGORY S ON C.CATEGORY_NUMBER = S.CATEGORY_NUMBER WHERE C.CATEGORY_PARENT IS NOT NULL AND S.WISH_NUMBER = #{wish_number}) C ON MC.CATEGORY_NUMBER = C.CATEGORY_PARENT AND C.WISH_NUMBER = MC.WISH_NUMBER) SELLER ON SELLER.WISH_NUMBER = WCS.WISH_NUMBER AND SELLER.CATEGORY_PARENT = WCS.CATEGORY_NUMBER WHERE SELLER.WISH_NUMBER = #{wish_number} AND WCS.USER_ID = #{user_id}

SELECT INFO.SELLER_COMPANY,INFO.WISH_NUMBER,INFO.USER_ID,INFO.WISH_CATEGORY_SELLER_PRICE,INFO.APPLY_STATUS,U.USER_PHONE FROM USER U JOIN ( SELECT S.SELLER_COMPANY,WA.WISH_NUMBER,WA.USER_ID,WA.WISH_CATEGORY_SELLER_PRICE,WA.APPLY_STATUS FROM SELLER S JOIN ( SELECT W.WISH_NUMBER,W.USER_ID,SUM(W.WISH_CATEGORY_SELLER_PRICE) AS WISH_CATEGORY_SELLER_PRICE,A.APPLY_STATUS FROM WISH_CATEGORY_SELLER W JOIN APPLY_STATUS A ON W.USER_ID=A.USER_ID AND W.WISH_NUMBER = A.WISH_NUMBER GROUP BY W.WISH_NUMBER,W.USER_ID,A.APPLY_STATUS) AS WA ON WA.USER_ID = S.USER_ID WHERE WA.WISH_NUMBER=#{wish_number}) AS INFO ON INFO.USER_ID = U.USER_ID;

SELECT WS.WISH_TITLE,WS.USER_ID,A.APPLY_STATUS,WS.WISH_NUMBER FROM APPLY_STATUS A JOIN( SELECT W.WISH_TITLE, W.WISH_NUMBER,S.USER_ID FROM WISH W JOIN WISH_CATEGORY_SELLER S ON W.WISH_NUMBER = S.WISH_NUMBER WHERE S.USER_ID=#{user_id} GROUP BY W.WISH_NUMBER) AS WS ON A.WISH_NUMBER = WS.WISH_NUMBER AND A.USER_ID = WS.USER_ID
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WISH_CATEGORY_SELLER WHERE WISH_NUMBER=#{wish_number} GROUP BY WISH_NUMBER
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM APPLY_STATUS WHERE WISH_NUMBER = #{wish_number} AND USER_ID != #{user_id} AND APPLY_STATUS IS NOT NULL
SELECT APPLY_STATUS FROM APPLY_STATUS WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id} AND WISH_NUMBER = #{wish_number}
SELECT A.USER_ID,W.WISH_NUMBER,W.WISH_TITLE,A.APPLY_STATUS FROM WISH W JOIN APPLY_STATUS A ON W.WISH_NUMBER = A.WISH_NUMBER WHERE A.USER_ID = #{user_id} AND A.APPLY_STATUS=2

SELECT S.SELLER_NAME,WA.WISH_NUMBER,WA.USER_ID,WA.WISH_CATEGORY_SELLER_PRICE,WA.WISH_NUMBER,WA.APPLY_STATUS FROM SELLER S JOIN (SELECT W.WISH_NUMBER,W.USER_ID,SUM(W.WISH_CATEGORY_SELLER_PRICE) AS WISH_CATEGORY_SELLER_PRICE,A.APPLY_STATUS FROM WISH_CATEGORY_SELLER W JOIN APPLY_STATUS A ON W.USER_ID=A.USER_ID AND W.WISH_NUMBER = A.WISH_NUMBER GROUP BY W.WISH_NUMBER,W.USER_ID,A.APPLY_STATUS) AS WA ON WA.USER_ID = S.USER_ID WHERE WA.WISH_NUMBER=#{wish_number}
